website_summaries.verdict: The TomTom Bandit ably addresses several pain points with other action cams thanks to its quick mobile editing, versatile mounting system and removable battery.
pros: TomTom's Bandit action camera uses built-in sensors to tag all the potential highlights in your clips to make editing easier
Its mobile app lets you quickly create a highlight reel just by shaking your smartphone
Charging and video/photo transfers can be done without a cable
Unique rotating mounting system makes getting the camera horizontal simple
cons: Though video quality is very good from the Bandit, you'll get better results for your $400 from GoPro's Hero4 Silver or Sony's Action Cam X1000V
GPS and other sensor information is only used for tagging

customer_reviews.title: A little devil
customer_reviews.text: The TomTom Bandit is indeed a little devil. The pictures are sharp, the video is also crisp. The only unusual thing is the distortion by the fisheye lense. That is something to get used to. But if you cut out the center of the picture, it is reasonable. From the accessories, I only use the little remote, the bike handle bar clamp and the GoPro connector. The instructions could be more elaborate but in the end you will figure out what works and what not. I bought a sturdy selfie-stick (Fugetek) and ordered a suction cup mount (Sametop) and I'm good to go.

product_meta.title: TomTom Bandit 4k Action Video Camera
product_meta.description: Style:Bandit Action Camera Premium PackIntroducing the TomTom Bandit Action Camera - just shake to edit. The TomTom Bandit is the first ever camera to come with a built-in media server, eliminating the need to download footage before being able to edit it. The camera works with a companion app, making it possible to create and share videos in a matter of minutes, simply by shaking a smartphone. The TomTom Bandit Action Camera is equipped with in-camera motion and GPS sensors to automatically find and tag exciting moments based on speed, altitude, G-force, acceleration and heart rate. Highlights can also be tagged manually with a tagging button on the camera or the remote control. The TomTom Bandit works with a smartphone app, which includes a superfast viewfinder. Footage can be reviewed instantly with the smartphone app thanks to the built-in media server. In editing mode, a simple shake of the smartphone instantly creates an exciting movie. Users can then easily make changes, add music and add overlays of favorite metrics, such as speed, before sharing with friends.
feature_bullets: 4k HD video camera provides the highest resolution action footage
Long battery life allows for 3h of nonstop filming with cable free batt stick
Sport Action camera contains built in sensors to monitor speed, g force, altitude, and rotation and appears on playback videos to prove your performance
Use the bandit app (iOS & android) for instant playback and to easily drag, drop and share all Action footage
Premium pack includes: remote control, handle bar mount, dive lens cover, 360 pitch mount, power cable and go pro mount adapter
